channel.title: Bug and crash report
channel.description:
Hello everyone ,I would like to report about bug as it happen to me for the first time,when this creature who make something like earth-shake attacks me I got stack in the wall and couldn't get out only by using save game so I can get ss for him at same place,I would like to add another ss but as I am new user I cant... :(
![2|690x387](upload://tBbScn16L1wXP19sbCQCW2PfBrK.jpeg)
Another thing my game crashed for unknown reason so I bring the DMP files so u can check it out
https://www.mediafire.com/file/xkiafryk2mg7fv8/crash_bms.exe_20200414225801_1.dmp/file
